title: Makiman
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Japanese, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers a large variety of veg options and has gluten free. Serves not only sushi but also a variety of rice and noodle bowls and salads, which all come in a veggie version. Veg*n sushi options include cucumber, radish, squash, squash, and inari sushi rolls. Salad dressing appears to be milk-based but is actually a dairy-free sesame vinaigrette. Interior is clean and bright with modern, Asian-influenced decor.
